alert.note: Alert for Bakersfield; Buttonwillow - Lost Hills - I5; Caruthers - San Joaquin - Selma; Delano-Wasco-Shafter; Fresno-Clovis; Hanford - Corcoran - Lemoore; Los Banos - Dos Palos; Merced - Madera - Mendota; Planada - Le Grand - Snelling; South End San Joaquin Valley; Southeast San Joaquin Valley; Visalia - Porterville - Reedley; West Side of Fresno and Kings Counties (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued January 06 at 11:37PM PST until January 09 at 8:00AM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...A FREEZE WARNING IS IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM PST LATE SUNDAY NIGHT UNTIL MONDAY MORNING UNTIL 8 AM PST TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 27 expected in rural areas. Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 31 expected in urban areas. * WHERE...The San Joaquin Valley * WHEN...From 2 AM PST late Sunday night until 8 AM PST Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops and other sensitive vegetation. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Sub-freezing temperatures are expected for a period of four to six hours between 2 AM PST and 8 AM PST each night and early morning.
info.instruction: Bring pets indoors and cover sensitive, exposed vegetation.
